cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Name: Technicians or technical bodies for quality control
cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Description: It can call upon the following technicians or technical bodies, especially those responsible for quality control. For technicians or technical bodies not belonging directly to the economic operator's undertaking but on whose capacities the economic operator relies as set out under Part II, Section C, separate ESPD forms must be filled in.

cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Name: For works contracts: technicians or technical bodies to carry out the work
cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Description: In the case of public works contracts, the economic operator will be able to call on the following technicians or technical bodies to carry out the work:

cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Name: Technical facilities and measures for ensuring quality
cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Description: It uses the following technical facilities and measures for ensuring quality and its study and research facilities are as follows:

cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Name: Study and research facilities
cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Description: It uses the following study and research facilities are as follows:

cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Name: Supply chain management
cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Description: It will be able to apply the following supply chain management and tracking systems when performing the contract:

cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Name: Educational and professional qualifications
cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Description: The following educational and professional qualifications are held by the service provider or the contractor itself, and/or (depending on the requirements set out in the relevant notice or the in the ESPD, the relevant notice or by its managerial staff.

cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Name: Environmental management measures
cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Description: The economic operator will be able to apply the following environmental management measures when performing the contract:

cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Name: Tools, plant or technical equipment
cac:TenderingCriterion.cbc:Description: The following tools, plant or technical equipment will be available to it for performing the contract:
